document.topic_text: 3 Benefits of Instant Redeemable Coupons Instant Gratification: One of the main benefits of instant redeemable coupons is actually in the name. Danielapaul Embed 1.Instant Gratification: One of the main benefits of instant redeemable coupons is actually in the name! One of the perks of these coupons is that they provide instantaneous gratification for a range of consumers. Consumers love getting a deal immediately rather than receiving a rebate or something of that sort. 2. In the Know: Instant redeemable coupons help consumers stay aware of great deals and seasonal sales. Instant redeemable coupons help many consumers make their buying decisions, as today’s economy drives everyone to find the best deals available. Additionally, studies show that when companies offer some consumers instant redeemable coupons or other special promotions- they actually end up buying more than they had originally planned on before entering the store. 3. Stand Out From the Competition: Instant redeemable coupons help your specific brand or particular product stand out on the shelf. Instant redeemable coupons contain 3 panels (front, back, and base) and are fixed together by creating a peel or a “peel here” label. 4.Does Not Require Shelf Space: Instant redeemable coupons require no extra shelf space and no necessary changes to your current packaging design. Instant redeemable coupons are placed directly on the product and can be affixed to your product quite easily. To learn more about Adcraft Labels and instant redeemable coupons, please call 1-800-892-1051 and visit adcraftlabels.com/ Read next page
